core: A Person of Some Importance
watchful=209,shadowy=210,dangerous=211,persuasive=212,consequence=715,importance=716

You need Watchful, Shadowy, Dangerous or Persuasive 100
to begin this. This includes bonuses from equipment.

Watch for a gold bordered card in the London Opportunities deck
that mentions a *coincidence*.
Meet the Ambitious Barrister in Your Lodgings.
Stroll around Watchmaker's Hill.
Wander through Veilgarden.
Tour Spite.
Walk down Ladybones Road.

Look for any one of these cards in the London Opportunities deck:
- A matter of the wardrobe
- A respectable address
- A little hideaway
- Friends and acquaintances
Look for **Sufficient Importance** in Your Lodgings.
There's an interesting briefcase in Your Lodgings.
Meet the Ambitious Barrister in the Bazaar Side-Streets
Acquire a Velocipede in the Bazaar Side-Streets.
Finish up in the Bazaar Side-Streets.
Congratulations! You are a Person of Some Importance.
A Person of Even Greater Importance

Raise your base Watchful, Shadowy, Dangerous or Persuasive 
to 200. This does not include equipment.

Find the **Unfinished Business** storylet at one of the below
locations to achieve a specialization. You may need to
do some shopping first. You can only pick one. It is possible,
though not easy, to change it later.
Ladybones Road
Spite
Watchmaker's Hill
Veilgarden

You must become *A Person of Some Importance* before you can
become A Person of Even Greater Importance.
You've become a person of even greater importance!
